name: SPACE3D
description:
3d space shooter written in JavaScript with the Three.js library. Works in Chrome; I haven't tested it in other browsers. There are also downloadable Mac and Windows versions, though note that the Windows version has not been tested. 

Model made in Blender. 

WASD/CONTROL or ARROWS/X

I think the high score system isn't working here, though it seems to be fine in the offline version.
